Missile_Volley.help: The Heavy Trooper fires a barrage of micro missiles at its target dealing moderate lethal and fire damage. Targets struck by this attack will also suffer toxic damage over time and may be knocked off their feet.
Missile_Volley.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Lethal/Fire), Foe Minor DoT(Toxic), Knockdown
Missile_Volley.targetHelp: The Trooper's chemical warhead continues to burn.

Missile_Barrage.help: The Heavy Trooper showers the battlefield with several micro missiles dealing high lethal and fire damage as well as inflicting minor toxic damage over time. Some targets of this attack may be knocked off of their feet.
Missile_Barrage.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), High DMG(Lethal/Fire), Foe Minor DoT(Toxic), Knockdown
Missile_Barrage.targetHelp: The Trooper's chemical warhead continues to burn.

Nerve_Gas_Rockets.help: The Heavy Trooper's rocket packs are armed with micro missiles loaded with nerve gas. These missiles cause minor lethal and fire damage immediately and may hold their targets. Targets struck by this attack will suffer toxic damage over time.
Nerve_Gas_Rockets.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DMG(Lethal/Fire), Foe Hold, Moderate DoT(Toxic)
Nerve_Gas_Rockets.targetHelp: The Trooper's nerve gas warhead continues to burn.

EMP_Rockets.help: These missiles deal light fire and lethal damage and emit a constant EMP pulse which will drain endurance from their targets as well as reducing their regeneration for a short time.
EMP_Rockets.targetHelp: The Trooper's EMP warhead drains endurance as well as reducing the regeneration and recovery rates of its targets.

Plasma_Strafe.help: The twin plasma machine guns can strafe a wide area in front of the IDF soldier, protecting against close assault.
Plasma_Strafe.shortHelp: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy/Fire), DoT(Energy), Foe -Regen
Plasma_Strafe.targetHelp: The twin plasma machine guns can strafe a wide area in front of the IDF soldier, protecting against close assault.
Plasma_Strafe.targetShortHelp: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy/Fire), DoT(Energy), Foe -Regen

Focused_Burst.help: The twin plasma machine guns focused on a single target can do significant damage and drive them back.
Focused_Burst.shortHelp: Ranged, High DMG(Energy/Fire), DoT(Energy), Foe -Regen, Knockback
Focused_Burst.targetHelp: The twin plasma machine guns focused on a single target can do significant damage and drive them back.

All_Out_Assault.help: This desperation move fire all weapons on full automatic -- the plasma guns hitting nearby targets, the missile pods firing on those further out, and those standing in between getting hit by both, turning the area into a instant killing field.
All_Out_Assault.shortHelp: PBAoE, High DMG(Energy/Fire), DoT(Energy), Foe -Regen, Knockback - and/or - High DMG(Lethal/Fire), DoT(Toxic), Knockdown
All_Out_Assault.targetHelp: This desperation move fire all weapons on full automatic -- the plasma guns hitting nearby targets, the missile pods firing on those further out, and those standing in between getting hit by both, turning the area into a instant killing field.
All_Out_Assault.targetShortHelp: PBAoE, High DMG(Energy/Fire), DoT(Energy), Foe -Regen, Knockback - and/or - High DMG(Lethal/Fire), DoT(Toxic), Knockdown
